name: Webcam Capture v0.3.12
body:
This is official release of Webcam Capture API, version 0.3.12. Dependency is available for everyone directly from Maven Central repository:

Maven:

```xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.github.sarxos</groupId>
    <artifactId>webcam-capture</artifactId>
    <version>0.3.12</version>
</dependency>
```

Gradle:

```plain
compile 'com.github.sarxos:webcam-capture:0.3.12'
```

Grape:

```
@Grapes( 
@Grab(group='com.github.sarxos', module='webcam-capture', version='0.3.12') 
)
```

Ivy:

```xml
<dependency org="com.github.sarxos" name="webcam-capture" rev="0.3.12" />
```

The JAR file will all required dependencies can be also downloaded in ZIP file in case if someone does not use Maven:

[webcam-capture-0.3.12-dist.zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture/0.3.12/webcam-capture-0.3.12-dist.zip)

The following capture drivers are available for 0.3.12:

- webcam-capture-driver-vlcj | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-vlcj|0.3.12|bundle) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-vlcj/0.3.12/webcam-capture-driver-vlcj-0.3.12-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-v4l4j | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-v4l4j|0.3.12|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-v4l4j/0.3.12/webcam-capture-driver-v4l4j-0.3.12-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-screencapture | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-screencapture|0.3.12|bundle) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-screencapture/0.3.12/webcam-capture-driver-screencapture-0.3.12-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-openimaj | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-openimaj|0.3.12|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-openimaj/0.3.12/webcam-capture-driver-openimaj-0.3.12-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil|0.3.12|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil/0.3.12/webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil-0.3.12-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-jmf | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-jmf|0.3.12|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-jmf/0.3.12/webcam-capture-driver-jmf-0.3.12-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-opencv | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-opencv|0.3.12|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-opencv/0.3.12/webcam-capture-driver-opencv-0.3.12-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-ipcam | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-ipcam|0.3.12|bundle) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-ipcam/0.3.12/webcam-capture-driver-ipcam-0.3.12-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer|0.3.12|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer/0.3.12/webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer-0.3.12-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam|0.3.12|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam/0.3.12/webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam-0.3.12-dist.zip)

Known issues / caveats:

- This version (0.3.11) does not always work on ARM devices, however you can change this by replacing BridJ JAR (use 0.6.3-SNAPSHOT instead of 0.7).
- The classes from [webcam-capture-driver-screencapture](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/tree/master/webcam-capture-drivers/driver-screencapture) are actually in package `com.github.sarxos.webcam.ds.gstreamer` instead of `com.github.sarxos.webcam.ds.screencapture`. You will have to change this after newer version is released.

Full list of changes between 0.3.11 and 0.3.12 can be found below (the most bottom ones are the oldest):

* [`e19125c`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/e19125c) | [maven-release-plugin] prepare release webcam-capture-parent-0.3.12
* [`b4a1403`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/b4a1403) | [maven-release-plugin] rollback the release of webcam-capture-parent-0.3.12
* [`61d79c3`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/61d79c3) | [maven-release-plugin] prepare release webcam-capture-parent-0.3.12
* [`da19ebd`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/da19ebd) | Add akka example to parent module
* [`177d768`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/177d768) | Ignore dependency-reduced-pom file
* [`ccab73b`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/ccab73b) | Let Travis.CI build on JDK8 insead of JDK7
* [`2093a7a`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/2093a7a) | Regenerate web page from newest README.md
* [`e9988c2`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/e9988c2) | Format POMs to conform with standards
* [`fa9eea3`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/fa9eea3) | Revert "[maven-release-plugin] prepare release webcam-capture-parent-0.3.12"
* [`e030176`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/e030176) | Revert "[maven-release-plugin] prepare for next development iteration"
* [`81b9239`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/81b9239) | Change parent OSS version
* [`afc752d`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/afc752d) | [maven-release-plugin] prepare for next development iteration
* [`70f2e4e`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/70f2e4e) | [maven-release-plugin] prepare release webcam-capture-parent-0.3.12
* [`b40a01c`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/b40a01c) | Fix typo in screen capture driver README.md
* [`c96f3c1`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/c96f3c1) | Add adaptive size writer with example, refs #551
* [`012fa10`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/012fa10) | Add comment in old (0.10.x) GStreamer driver
* [`d18bfa9`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/d18bfa9) | Add README.md in screen capture driver
* [`cc6087c`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/cc6087c) | Small fix in parallel buffer access example, refs #599
* [`abaf107`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/abaf107) | Add BufferAccess interface to IpCamDevice, refs #607
* [`12c3f55`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/12c3f55) | Add pom.xml.bak to files ignored by git
* [`fbd3c18`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/fbd3c18) | Merge pull request #609 from yuripourre/master
* [`3a238cf`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/3a238cf) | Add example for parallel use of Webcam.getImageBytes(), refs #599
* [`c8484d1`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/c8484d1) | New example - how to use WebcamPanel.ImageSupplier, refs #599
* [`727db46`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/727db46) | Ability to specify ImageProvider in WebcamPanel, refs #599
* [`c43160e`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/c43160e) | Fix typo
* [`781861f`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/781861f) | Non blocking webcam panel starting
* [`ae85738`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/ae85738) | Small changes and javadocs in screen capture driver
* [`a353467`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/a353467) | Update README.md, add examples for flip and rotate
* [`969202a`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/969202a) | Example for WebcamPanel Painter which flips image, refs #581
* [`9a12ed2`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/9a12ed2) | Example for WebcamPanel Painter which rotates image, refs #581
* [`de05c76`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/de05c76) | Create http context only once instead on every get
* [`13b0b61`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/13b0b61) | Redisign IP camera driver and fix FPS calculation
* [`6a47494`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/6a47494) | Bind WebcamStreamer server socket to 0.0.0.0
* [`3876d3c`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/3876d3c) | Do not dump exception in WebcamStreamer on connection close
* [`facdf3b`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/facdf3b) | Add discovery support in composite driver, refs #332
* [`d2d9a40`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/d2d9a40) | Merge pull request #569 from gubjack/capture-resolution
* [`0e0ccae`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/0e0ccae) | Add screen capture driver
* [`d4a5c8d`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/d4a5c8d) | Update README.md, links to Genuine Coder's videos
* [`7e35538`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/7e35538) | Do not use JPEG parser with MJPEG format
* [`5ff7c3c`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/5ff7c3c) | Use Kernel Streaming instead of Direct Show source
* [`b6e9044`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/b6e9044) | Add MJPEG support in GStreamer driver, refs #145
* [`524f7ba`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/524f7ba) | Add unit test for JHBlurFilter
* [`55c9bda`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/55c9bda) | Fix HeadlessException in Travis build
* [`b64caaf`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/b64caaf) | Small unit tests for WebcamPanel
* [`a04d1ca`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/a04d1ca) | Fix logs in LTI-CIVIL library loader
* [`5050301`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/5050301) | Make Maven build on Travis less verbose
* [`db8a4c5`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/db8a4c5) | Switch to JDK7 and add some tests
* [`233672f`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/233672f) | Bump version up in LTI-CIVIL driver README
* [`db7e015`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/db7e015) | Merge pull request #552 from yuripourre/patch-1
* [`6a5b30a`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/6a5b30a) | Merge pull request #550 from junbaor/patch-1
* [`2044162`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/2044162) | WebcamPanel properties for spanish, refs #549
* [`8632fda`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/8632fda) | Use source 1.8 for GStreamer 1.x capture driver
* [`e3e92c7`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/e3e92c7) | Fix GStreamer 1.x capture driver POM
* [`809edcf`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/809edcf) | Add resolutions support in OpenCV capture driver
* [`5c14101`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/5c14101) | Add example for Do-Not-Engage zone feature, refs #524
* [`9ee9d94`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/9ee9d94) | Add new motion detection algorithm (DNE), refs #524
* [`2fd33d1`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/2fd33d1) | Merge pull request #548 from kamenomagic/master
* [`e7847df`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/e7847df) | Update README to reflect correct version and new examples
* [`fb581d3`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/fb581d3) | Add example for how to use webcam from Akka
* [`5b985bf`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/5b985bf) | Update zxing to newest version and upgrade example to Java 8
* [`35536a8`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/35536a8) | Merge pull request #538 from WesleyM77/patch-1
* [`e797e74`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/e797e74) | Update auth per note from Dan Hagiiani
* [`856c6c2`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/856c6c2) | Webcam JavaFX Service and View example, refs #357
* [`64fdd35`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/64fdd35) | Add dedicated class for D-Link DSC-933L IP camera, refs #511
* [`44e7b2e`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/44e7b2e) | GStreamer 1.0 capture driver, continuation 2
* [`4750d89`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/4750d89) | GStreamer 1.0 capture driver, continuation
* [`301f50a`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/301f50a) | New GStreamer 1.0 capture driver, work in progress
* [`492026e`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/492026e) | Merge pull request #499 from antego/patch-1
* [`c370505`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/c370505) | Merge pull request #510 from jbq/master
* [`7e82df6`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/7e82df6) | GStreamer 1.x work in progress
* [`47db27f`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/47db27f) | More exclusions in OpenIMAJ transitive dependencies
* [`4a6cd2e`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/4a6cd2e) | Merge pull request #483 from peterchaula/master
* [`d84765b`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/d84765b) | Add possibility to set IP cameras http timeout
* [`8330cf0`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/8330cf0) | Merge pull request #441 from twistedtwin/master
* [`cdb4a39`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/cdb4a39) | Add maven dependency from central, refs #442
* [`2ccfaed`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/2ccfaed) | Set timeout once, after grabber is open, fixes #431
* [`7c565ab`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/7c565ab) | Cleanup after fixing refs #432
* [`92a2fc8`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/92a2fc8) | Fine tuning saving memory consumption in JFX example, refs #432
* [`158b65a`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/158b65a) | Fix rendering memory leak in JavaFX example, fixes #432
* [`87ee6bf`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/87ee6bf) | Fix link to snapshot
* [`ce6d865`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/ce6d865) | Merge pull request #422 from babanin/master
* [`5f6cb52`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/5f6cb52) | Merge pull request #404 from levackt/master
* [`09eef0d`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/09eef0d) | Merge pull request #418 from jonburgin/master
* [`287addb`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/287addb) | Merge pull request #415 from jonburgin/master
* [`4e26313`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/4e26313) | Update parent POMs to reflect version change
* [`5473e3b`](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/5473e3b) | [maven-release-plugin] prepare for next development iteration

name: Webcam Capture v0.3.11
body:
This is official release of Webcam Capture API, version 0.3.11. Dependency is available for everyone directly from Maven Central repository:

Maven:

```xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.github.sarxos</groupId>
    <artifactId>webcam-capture</artifactId>
    <version>0.3.11</version>
</dependency>
```

Gradle:

```plain
compile 'com.github.sarxos:webcam-capture:0.3.11'
```

Grape:

```
@Grapes( 
@Grab(group='com.github.sarxos', module='webcam-capture', version='0.3.11') 
)
```

Ivy:

```xml
<dependency org="com.github.sarxos" name="webcam-capture" rev="0.3.11" />
```

The JAR file will all required dependencies can be also downloaded in ZIP file in case if someone does not use Maven:

[webcam-capture-0.3.11-dist.zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture/0.3.11/webcam-capture-0.3.11-dist.zip)

The following capture drivers are available for 0.3.11:

- webcam-capture-driver-vlcj | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-vlcj|0.3.11|bundle) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-vlcj/0.3.11/webcam-capture-driver-vlcj-0.3.11-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-openimaj | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-openimaj|0.3.11|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-openimaj/0.3.11/webcam-capture-driver-openimaj-0.3.11-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil|0.3.11|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil/0.3.11/webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil-0.3.11-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-jmf | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-jmf|0.3.11|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-jmf/0.3.11/webcam-capture-driver-jmf-0.3.11-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-javacv | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-javacv|0.3.11|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-javacv/0.3.11/webcam-capture-driver-javacv-0.3.11-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-ipcam | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-ipcam|0.3.11|bundle) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-ipcam/0.3.11/webcam-capture-driver-ipcam-0.3.11-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer|0.3.11|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer/0.3.11/webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer-0.3.11-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam|0.3.11|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam/0.3.11/webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam-0.3.11-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-v4l4j | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-v4l4j|0.3.11|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-v4l4j/0.3.11/webcam-capture-driver-v4l4j-0.3.11-dist.zip)

Known issues / caveats:

- This version (0.3.11) does not always work on ARM devices, however you can change this by replacing BridJ JAR (use 0.6.3-SNAPSHOT instead of 0.7).

Full list of changes between 0.3.10 and 0.3.11 can be found below (the most bottom ones are the oldest):

* [```a9423c9```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/a9423c9) | [maven-release-plugin] prepare release webcam-capture-parent-0.3.11
* [```da713fe```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/da713fe) | Small enhancements in WebSocket example, refs #390
* [```0f87892```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/0f87892) | Fix updater failure when underlying driver throws exception, fixes #390
* [```e23df55```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/e23df55) | Merge pull request #392 from schallee/master
* [```a659148```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/a659148) | Fix buggy synchronization in V4L4J driver
* [```d93e386```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/d93e386) | Add image rotation example
* [```36e1138```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/36e1138) | Add example to list in README, clean file format, refs #350
* [```3eafb77```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/3eafb77) | Use convert() instead of getBufferedImage() as suggested
* [```77ec9a2```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/77ec9a2) | Add cause to exception being thrown in JavaCV device
* [```d50521d```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/d50521d) | Upgrade JavaCV from 0.8 to 1.0, fixes #363
* [```1a8501f```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/1a8501f) | Merge pull request #350 from tm1990/master
* [```9827348```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/9827348) | Update LICENSE.txt
* [```2eab2b6```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/2eab2b6) | Update LICENSE.txt
* [```a2dd852```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/a2dd852) | Get unsupported resolution work with predefined sizes, refs #327
* [```feb8cce```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/feb8cce) | Upgrade BridJ to version 0.7
* [```e33c784```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/e33c784) | Change parent POM
* [```e2914f9```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/e2914f9) | Merge pull request #330 from fcestrada/master
* [```0d41c59```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/0d41c59) | Add link to Raspberry Pi howto [ci skip]
* [```1b144fa```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/1b144fa) | Merge pull request #323 from krok32/master
* [```e90f760```](https://github.com/sarxos/webcam-capture/commit/e90f760) | Add support for RasPi camera module in v4l4j driver

name: Webcam Capture v0.3.10
body:
This is official release of Webcam Capture API, version 0.3.10. Dependency is available in Maven Central:

``` xml
<dependency>
    <groupId>com.github.sarxos</groupId>
    <artifactId>webcam-capture</artifactId>
    <version>0.3.10</version>
</dependency>
```

The JAR file will all required dependencies can be also downloaded in ZIP file in case if someone does not use Maven:

[webcam-capture-0.3.10-dist.zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture/0.3.10/webcam-capture-0.3.10-dist.zip)

JavaDoc is available at:

http://webcam-capture.sarxos.pl/site/webcam-capture/apidocs/index.html

The following capture drivers are available for 0.3.10:

- webcam-capture-driver-vlcj | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-vlcj|0.3.10|bundle) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-vlcj/0.3.10/webcam-capture-driver-vlcj-0.3.10-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-openimaj | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-openimaj|0.3.10|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-openimaj/0.3.10/webcam-capture-driver-openimaj-0.3.10-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil|0.3.10|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil/0.3.10/webcam-capture-driver-lti-civil-0.3.10-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-jmf | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-jmf|0.3.10|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-jmf/0.3.10/webcam-capture-driver-jmf-0.3.10-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-javacv | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-javacv|0.3.10|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-javacv/0.3.10/webcam-capture-driver-javacv-0.3.10-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-ipcam | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-ipcam|0.3.10|bundle) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-ipcam/0.3.10/webcam-capture-driver-ipcam-0.3.10-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer|0.3.10|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer/0.3.10/webcam-capture-driver-gstreamer-0.3.10-dist.zip)
- webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam | [maven](http://search.maven.org/#artifactdetails|com.github.sarxos|webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam|0.3.10|jar) | [zip](http://repo.sarxos.pl/maven2/com/github/sarxos/webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam/0.3.10/webcam-capture-driver-fswebcam-0.3.10-dist.zip)

Known issues / caveats:
- This version (0.3.10) does not work on ARM devices, however you can change this by replacing BridJ JAR (use 0.6.3-SNAPSHOT instead of 0.6.2).

Full list of changes between 0.3.9 and 0.3.10 can be found below (the most bottom ones are the oldest).

name: Webcam Capture v0.3.9
body: This is last release for which all required Maven artifacts exists, however it's not the newest one. I suggest to use newer release if you don't need it to be in Maven Central.

name: Webcam Capture v0.3.8
body: This is Webcam Capture v0.3.8 release.
